statements: UPSERT INTO Robotics (robot_id, robot_name, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture) VALUES ('1', 'Robot1', 'Manufacturer1', 2021)
UPSERT INTO Robotics (robot_id, robot_name, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture) VALUES ('2', 'Robot2', 'Manufacturer2', 2020)
UPSERT INTO Robotics (robot_id, robot_name, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture) VALUES ('3', 'Robot3', 'Manufacturer3', 2019)
UPSERT INTO Robot (id, name, manufacturer, year, price) VALUES ('1111-1111', 'Robo 1', 'Tech Co.', 2021, 1000.00);
UPSERT INTO RobotPart (id, name, manufacturer, type) VALUES ('2222-2222', 'Arm', 'Parts Inc.', 'Arm');
UPSERT INTO Robot (id, name, manufacturer, year, price) VALUES ('1111-1111', 'Robo 1', 'Tech Co.', 2021, 1200.00);

UPSERT INTO robots (id, name, manufacturer, year_manufactured, price) VALUES (1, 'Robot 1', 'Manufacturer A', 2021, 1000) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = 'Robot 1', manufacturer = 'Manufacturer A', year_manufactured = 2021, price = 1000;
UPSERT INTO robot_parts (part_id, part_name, robot_id, quantity, price) VALUES (1, 'Arm', 1, 2, 200) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE part_name = 'Arm', quantity = 2, price = 200;

UPSERT INTO robot_tasks (task_id, task_name, robot_id, description, task_time) VALUES (1, 'Task 1', 1, 'Assemble components', 60) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE task_name = 'Task 1', description = 'Assemble components', task_time = 60;
UPSERT INTO Robot (id, name, manufacturer) VALUES (1, 'Robot1', 'Manufacturer1') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name='Robot1', manufacturer='Manufacturer1';
UPSERT INTO RobotPart (part_id, part_name, robot_id) VALUES (1, 'Part1', 1) ON CONFLICT (part_id) DO UPDATE SET part_name='Part1', robot_id=1;
UPSERT INTO RobotTask (task_id, task_name, robot_id) VALUES (1, 'Task1', 1) ON CONFLICT (task_id) DO UPDATE SET task_name='Task1', robot_id=1;
UPSERT INTO Robotics.Manufacturers (manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name) VALUES (1, 'Manufacturer A') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE manufacturer_name = 'Manufacturer A'
UPSERT INTO Robotics.Robots (robot_id, robot_name, manufacturer_id) VALUES (1, 'Robot A', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE robot_name = 'Robot A', manufacturer_id = 1
UPSERT INTO Robotics.Components (component_id, component_name, robot_id) VALUES (1, 'Component A', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE component_name = 'Component A', robot_id = 1
